summary: I WAS TOWING A TRAILER FOR APPROX: 5 MILES WHEN I NOTICE A STRANGE ODOR AND I PULLED OVER  AND REALIZED THE TRUCK HAD CAUGHT ON FIRE BY IT SELF  AND POLICE AND GOOD SAMARITIN TRIED TO PUT IT OUT BUT WAS NOT SUCCESSFUL . HENCE THE TRUCK AND TRAILER WERE A TOTAL LOSS ALONG WITH $ 750 WORTH HAND TOOLS. ( TRAILER WORTH  APPROX: $12,500)  I WAS ON A TWO LANE ROAD SPEED 40 (IT WAS A RENTAL TRUCK)
